actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize appropriations for continuation of construction of distribution systems and drains on the San Luis Unit, Central Valley Project, California.

summary.text: Authorizes the appropriation of $43,000,000 for fiscal year 1979 for continuation of distribution systems and drains on the San Luis Unit, Central Valley Project, California.

titles.title: A bill to authorize appropriations for continuation of construction of distribution systems and drains on the San Luis Unit, Central Valley Project, California.
